trans-unit.source: The exception that is thrown when a promotion fails.
trans-unit.target: Unntaket forårsakes når en kampanje mislykkes.

trans-unit.source: This exception should be thrown by an implementation of <xref:System.Transactions.IPromotableSinglePhaseNotification> interface to indicate that a call to <xref:System.Transactions.ITransactionPromoter.Promote%2A> has failed.
trans-unit.target: Dette unntaket skal bli utløst av en implementering av <xref:System.Transactions.IPromotableSinglePhaseNotification>grensesnittet for å angi at et kall til <xref:System.Transactions.ITransactionPromoter.Promote%2A>mislyktes.</xref:System.Transactions.ITransactionPromoter.Promote%2A> </xref:System.Transactions.IPromotableSinglePhaseNotification>

trans-unit.source: If an implementation of <xref:System.Transactions.IPromotableSinglePhaseNotification> fails a promotion due to an exception that is not fatal, it should catch that exception and create a TransactionPromotionException with the original exception as the inner exception.
trans-unit.target: Hvis en implementering av <xref:System.Transactions.IPromotableSinglePhaseNotification>mislykkes kampanje på grunn av et unntak som ikke er uopprettelig den skal som innhentingsunntak og opprette en TransactionPromotionException med det opprinnelige unntaket som det interne unntaket.</xref:System.Transactions.IPromotableSinglePhaseNotification>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Transactions.TransactionPromotionException"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Transactions.TransactionPromotionException"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Transactions.TransactionPromotionException"></xref> class with the specified message.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Transactions.TransactionPromotionException"> </xref> klassen med den angitte meldingen.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that contains a message that explains why the exception occurred.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.String>som inneholder en melding som forklarer hvorfor unntaket oppstod.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Transactions.TransactionPromotionException"></xref> class with the specified serialization and streaming context information.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Transactions.TransactionPromotionException"> </xref> klasse med den angitte serialiseringen og direkteavspilling informasjon om sikkerhetskontekst.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> object that describes a failed serialization.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref> -objektet som beskriver en mislykket serialisering.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> object that describes a failed serialization context.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref> -objektet som beskriver en mislykket serialisering kontekst.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Transactions.TransactionPromotionException"></xref> class with the specified message and inner exception.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Transactions.TransactionPromotionException"> </xref> klassen med den angitte meldings- og indre unntaket.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that contains a message that explains why the exception occurred.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.String>som inneholder en melding som forklarer hvorfor unntaket oppstod.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Gets the exception instance that causes the current exception.
trans-unit.target: Henter unntak-forekomsten som fører til at den gjeldende unntaket.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException*> property.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se den <xref:System.Exception.InnerException*>egenskapen.</xref:System.Exception.InnerException*>
